alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Pecos (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 29 at 1:14PM CDT until October 30 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Glass Mountains of Pecos County, the Davis Mountains, and Davis Mountains Foothills. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Take it slow. Ice accumulation is more likely on elevated surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452- 9292.

area.areaDesc: Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Pecos
